text: Haele ba latotseng, ba sitisa batho ho kena tseleng e lebisang ho Allah le ‘nqalong e Halalelang ea thapelo, eo Re e khethetseng batho bohle hoba ‘moho ho eona; baahi ba moo le baeti, ka bobeli ba na le tokelo ea moo; mong le mong ea ikemiselitseng ho baka pherekano moo, Ruri re tla mo latsoisa kahlolo e mahlonoko
